timeline.message: Fixed the issue: Next button not visible on Researchstack-based screens in some scenarios

timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -219,12 +219,7 @@
     <string name="false_text">False</string>
     <string name="signature">Signature</string>
     <string name="signature_form_step">SIGNATURE_FORM_STEP</string>
-    <string name="first_name1">First Name</string>
-    <string name="first_name2">First name</string>
-    <string name="first_name3">Required</string>
-    <string name="last_name1">Last Name</string>
-    <string name="last_name2">Last name</string>
-    <string name="last_name3">Required</string>

replies.bodyText: we've reused the string and have removed duplicates
replies.author: naveenr-btc
